SEARCH
Package UserSystem

Class UserLoader

Object
UserLoader
public class UserLoader extends Object
The UserLoader class is responsible for loading user data into a given map. It utilizes the UserService to fetch user data from an external source.

  • Constructor Details

    • UserLoader

      public UserLoader(Map<String,User> users)
      Constructs a UserLoader object.
      Parameters:
      users - a map where the loaded user data will be stored, with user IDs as keys and User objects as values.

  • Method Details

    • loadInitialUsers

      public void loadInitialUsers()
      Loads the initial set of users from the UserService. The loaded users are stored in the provided map. If an error occurs during the loading process, an error message is printed to the console.
